/2fauth.description: Share to store 2FAuth related files uid:gid must be (1000:1000).
/2fauth.label: Config Storage [e.g. 2FAuth-config]

APP_URL.description: Enter http://<myservername>:<UI Port>, using the 2FAuth WebUI port set earlier.
APP_URL.label: APP_URL [e.g. http://<myservername>:<UI Port>]

ASSET_URL.description: Enter http://<myservername>:<UI Port>, using the 2FAuth WebUI port set earlier.
ASSET_URL.label: ASSET_URL [e.g. http://<myservername>:<UI Port>]

2FAuth.description:
A Web-UI enabled self-hosted alternative to One Time Passcode (OTP) generators like Google Authenticator, designed for both mobile and desktop.

Note: runs as UID:GID (1000:1000): mapped Share must provide access accordingly.

Based on the official OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture
2FAuth.more_info: The full documentation for this rock-on can be found at https://docs.2fauth.app/.
